item.title: Bank of England narrowly votes to cut interest rates to 4% as balancing act continues
item.description: The Bank of England cut interest rates from 4.25% to 4% on Thursday as the central bank resumes a "gradual and careful" approach to lowering interest ...

item.title: Trump's 'reciprocal' tariffs come into effect, hitting dozens of U.S. trading partners
item.description: Many of the U.S.' trading partners now face higher tariffs on their exports to the country.

item.title: Russia weighs in on U.S.-India tariff spat, saying New Delhi can choose its own trade partners
item.description: The Kremlin commented on Tuesday that Trump's comments were "attempts to force countries to stop trade relations with Russia."

item.title: Trump’s tariff playbook comes with a baseball twist
item.description: Say what you like about U.S. President Donald Trump's leadership style and policies, but he certainly has a unique way with words.

item.title: War-weary Syria will be hurt further by Trump's 41% tariff rate — the highest on earth
item.description: The tariffs could be a form of U.S. leverage over the decisions of the fragile Al Sharaa government, one analyst suggested.
